interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Topwon 4.5Inch Makeup Remover Pads Washable Cotton Face Cleansing Pad for Sensitive Skin 3 Packs Facial Washing Puffs to Remove Mascara Foundation Lipstick
Review Date: 2021/02/25
Store: Topwon
Product Description: ['Make up removal pads are easily exfoliating and remove all makeup, creams, sunscreen & cosmetics when wet.It can be facial makeup cleansing towel, eye makeup remover cloths, foundation make-up remover wipes, lipstick removing cleaning puff. Compact size is easy for travel or camping A ecofriendly makeup removing solution for you and the environment Makeup removal pads and facial cleaning puffs Cotton fleece washing face cloth pad with inner sponge Perfect for washing with only water or facial cleanser to help people cleaning face, makeup remove Washable pad we recommend wash with soap each time after use Size: 4.5Inch*0.8Inch,Please choose your order quantity']
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Topwon', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '3.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Package Dimensions': '6.37 x 5.51 x 2.44 inches; 0.95 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'HHA1104', 'Manufacturer': 'Topwon'}
Review Text: I love these little disk pads for face cleaning. These are a pretty pink and are so soft.  For makeup removal with no cleanser they cleaned my face and removed a lot of eye makeup but not all of it. I am removing eye makeup with cotton pads but face makeup can be totally removed with this little pad. These are softer than washcloths and feel great. I washed them with my towels and they came out perfect.
Review Title: Soft
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Osensia Silver Conditioner for Brassy Hair - Toning Purple Conditioner - Paraben Free Blonde Treatment for Highlights, Platinum, Bleached, and Gray Hair - Grape Seed Hydrates and Brightens Color
Osensia
{'Brand': 'Osensia', 'Item Form': 'conditioner', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Oily, Color Treated, bleached, Dry, Normal', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 2.2 x 2.2 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '039853185725'}
My hair is professionally colored monthly and I still have problems with oxidation resulting in brassiness. I began using this conditioner shortly after my hair was colored in November and I just went for a touch up and got feed back from my stylist. While I thought the color had less brassiness I wanted her professional opinion. Without prompting she said my hair looked great (except for the roots) and asked what I had been doing different. The silver conditioner was my response. My husband, who is totally white haired also has been using the conditioner once per week. To keep the yellow out of his hair he shampoos and conditions purple once a week and this has been a positive addition to his routine. Be careful not to over use this product because the results will be undesirable.
Reduces Oxidation and Brassiness
Replacement Toothbrush Heads Compatible With Oral B Braun Electric Toothbrush, 4 Count
HDY
{'Brand': 'HDY', 'Size': '4 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Extra Soft', 'Number of Pieces': '4', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.43 x 0.39 x 2.76 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '632088377561', 'Manufacturer': 'HDY'}
After buying name brand toothbrushes for years I was skeptical to try an off brand. So far both my husband and I are impressed with the quality of these brushes. They are firmer than the name brand brush but that is good because the brand brushes splay out the bristles long before the 3 month recommended change time. He tried this brush first and commented that his teeth felt so much cleaner, when I brushed later I agreed with his reaction. These come 4 in a package with color rings attached. The brushes are not individually wrapped so the extras went into a plastic bag for clean storage.
Terrific Value
FAELBATY 2 Pack Shower Caps for Women Waterproof and Reusable Elastic Printed Shower Cap Beauty Salon Spa Shower Caps (leopard)
FAELBATY
{'Brand': 'FAELBATY', 'Material': 'Ethylene Vinyl Acetate (EVA)', 'Pattern': 'Leopard', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 6.65 x 1.06 inches; 1.41 Ounces'}
Personally I like this shower cap better than a more expensive one I already had. It comes flat so if you plan to travel with it it is a good choice. I like it because it is not so bouffant that it gets wet and then drips down my back as I am toweling off. It dries fast too. This fits my average size head without drooping on to my forehead during a shower.
Folds Flat
MOSTORY Glitter Crystal Liquid Eyeshadow Set - 4 Pack Pigmented Liquid Eye shadows Matte Shimmer Metallic Quick Dry Crease Resistant Long Lasting Flake-Proof Blendable Non-Greasy Eye Makeup (4 Pack)
MOSTORY
{'Brand': 'MOSTORY', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Long last, Crease proof, Blendable', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 4.49 x 0.87 inches; 5.11 Ounces'}
Four glittering shades of eye shadow make up this affordable set. The applicator is easy to use and the product goes on smoothly and stays on for hours. For special events or if you are a dramatic personality these shadows will have you rocking the look.  These shadows scream creativity and fun. As an accent for a more discreet look or a full blown lid cover these are the glittery choice to make.
Beautiful Shades

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus**: Continues to prioritize products addressing brassiness in color-treated hair, integrating specialized conditioners and targeted treatments post-coloring to combat oxidation.

- **Product Preference**: Emphasizes health-conscious choices, favoring paraben-free formulas and effective toning agents. Open to off-brand products if they maintain quality standards, showcasing versatility in her beauty product selections.

- **Oral Care Interest**: Maintains a strong preference for high-quality oral care products, highlighting superior cleaning in toothbrush heads along with a routine of regular replacements for optimal hygiene.

- **Makeup Preferences**: Recently demonstrated an interest in creative makeup options and effective removal techniques, favoring soft, reusable pads for makeup removal. This reflects a balance of practicality and a focus on aesthetically pleasing items that enhance her beauty routine.

- **Routine & Usage**: Incorporates consistent hair maintenance routines alongside specialized treatments while actively engaging family in her product experiences and decisions, illustrating a trend toward family-oriented personal care.

- **Feedback-Oriented**: Values professional validation and seeks stylist input for product effectiveness. Relies on spousal feedback, emphasizing collaborative decision-making in product selections.

- **Caution with Usage**: Demonstrates awareness of product application guidelines, avoiding overuse to prevent adverse effects, which reflects a conscientious approach to personal care.

- **Versatile Care Preferences**: Recent purchases of reusable, practical beauty accessories highlight an interest in eco-friendly solutions that simplify her personal care routine, complementing her established focus on quality and creativity.

Overall, the user balances health-conscious personal care with a commitment to quality, creativity, and family engagement in both hair care and beauty routines.
